casebody.data:
O'NAN
v.
NATIONWIDE INSURANCE COMPANY et al. 275P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019 Elizabeth M.T. O'Nan, for O'Nan, Elizabeth M.T. Lucienne H. Peoples, Attorney at Law, for Servpro Industries, Inc., et al. Mason Freeman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Nationwide Insurance Company, et al. Gemma L. Saluta, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for Nationwide Insurance Company, et al. John E. Spainhour, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Servpro Industries, Inc., et al.

*829The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of July 2019 by Defendant to dismiss appeal:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."
